name: Perrserker
description: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to shell armor.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
abilities.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

abilities.name: Steely Spirit
abilities.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
